name: com.ireshsampath.unity-assets.easy-tcp
description: EasyTCP is a Unity asset designed to simplify **TCP communication** (Transmission Control Protocol) within your game or application. It provides easy-to-use classes for setting up TCP **Server** and **Client** functionality.

samples.description: An example scene demonstrating how to set up and use the EasyTCP Server to listen for client connections and handle data transfer.
An example scene demonstrating how to set up and use the EasyTCP Client to connect to a server and send/receive data.
